OOC: How does he look? Umm...like seven feet tall, almost completly jet black. His swords are put into his back to make kinda a ridge looking thing. His eyes are bright blue, and teeth are very silver. He's very tough looking. 
IC: Vampirtron:
     "Yes, of course," He said to the bot that came to get him. He extended his right hand. "And who might you be? And if you don't mind me asking, to what group do you hold allegiance to?"
